name: claude-code-statusline
description: Real-time statusline for Claude Code with token usage and rate limits monitoring

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile=claude-statusline && bun run build:hooks
scripts.build:hooks: bun build src/hooks/subagent-start.ts --compile --outfile=claude-subagent-start && bun build src/hooks/subagent-stop.ts --compile --outfile=claude-subagent-stop
